FinEdge Services

Here's a list of different services that we provide...

FinEdge Collect is a global payment processing platform that lets you accept payments with various payment methods: credit and debit cards, bank transfers, eWallets and cash.

FinEdge Wallet is a ledger system and payments infrastructure that lets users hold and transfer funds between users wallets and sub wallets.

FinEdge Disburse is a digital platform to send local and international payouts and unlock new markets across the globe.

FinEdge Cards is for issuing physical and virtual cards around the globe.
